data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Triapitsyn, Serguei V. (2008): A review of Tachardiobius (Hymenoptera: Encyrtidae), with description of a new species from California, USA, a parasitoid of Tachardiella spp. (Hemiptera: Kerriidae). Zootaxa 1716: 44-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.274145
